channel.title: New on SigilGate
channel.description: Recent content in New on SigilGate

item.title: The Docs Section
item.description: The project works. The network is up. Now it’s time to bring order to the documentation and make the project truly open.

item.title: The About Section
item.description: The old About page was a placeholder. Now it’s a full section covering goals, mission, team, and an invitation to contribute.

item.title: gRPC path rotation
item.description: It’s been on the roadmap for a while â€” and it’s finally done. The most vulnerable segment of the network is now protected by automatic address rotation.
